p: The Abuja-based TRUST Cohort, an ongoing longitudinal implementation research study of MSM recruited through respondent driven sampling (RDS) has an HIV prevalence observed to be approximately 10 times higher than among all reproductive aged adults ( Baral et al. 2015; Charurat et al. 2015). The cohort has high rates of multiple sexually transmitted infections, a high incidence of HIV, and a high rate of bisexuality with 56% of cohort members reporting having female sexual partners in the last 12â€‰months and with 28% of MSM living with HIV reporting having concurrent regular male and female partners ( Supplementary Fig. S1).
